data.text: I waited patiently for Yahweh to help me,
When I had many troubles, it was as though I was in a deep pit.
He has given me a new song to sing,
Yahweh is pleased with those who trust him,
O Yahweh, my God, you have done many wonderful things!
Various kinds of sacrifices and other offerings are not the only things that delight you.
So I said to you, â€œYahweh, here I am,
O my God, I delight to do what you desire;
Whenever all your people are gathered,
And I have not kept to myself the news that you always act justly/fairly;
Yahweh, do not stop being merciful to me.
I have many troubles; so many that I cannot count them.
Humble those who are happy about my troubles, and cause them to be disgraced and ashamed.
I hope/desire that those who make fun of me
But I hope that all those who go to worship you will be very joyful [DOU].
As for me, I am poor and needy [DOU];
